name: Acrobat
description: You receive a special bonus of +20 to your Athletic • Gymnastics skill Category.

name: Arcane Discovery (Minor)
description: You may learn and use one Arcane • Open spell list as an Own Realm • Open list.

name: Arcane Discovery (Major)
description: You may learn and use one Arcane • Closed spell list as an Own Realm • Closed list.

name: Assassin Training
description: The Ambush skill is classified as everyman for you.

name: Deadly Training
description: You receive a special bonus of +25 to your Poison Lore, Use/Remove Poison, Silent Kill, Stalk, Hide and Ambush maneuvers (not to critical modifications).

name: Directed Weapons Master (Minor)
description: One weapon skill may be classified as everyman.

name: Directed Weapons Master (Major)
description: One weapon skill may be classified as occupational. All other skills in the same category are classified as everyman.

name: Geographic Awareness
description: You receive a special bonus of +35 to your Mapping and Direction Sense skills. You have a special bonus of +25 to your Navigation skill for a given area if you have seen a map of it and have studied it for more than ten minutes.

name: Gymnastic Training
description: You receive a special bonus of +35 to your Mapping and Direction Sense skills. You have a special bonus of +25 to your Navigation skill for a given area if you have seen a map of it and have studied it for more than ten minutes.

name: Herbalist
description: You naturally recognize herbs and poisons and may use them. You also receive a special bonus of +20 to all of your Cooking, Foraging, Use Prepared Herbs, Prepare Herbs, Poison Lore, and Herb Lore maneuvers.

name: Inner Reserve (Lesser)
description: You can withstand more pain than a normal person. When determining your available concussion hits you may add a +1 to each Body Development rank your purchase. For example, if your Body Development progression is normally 0 • 6 • 4 • 2 • 1, you will gain 7 points for the first ten ranks, 5 for the second ten, etc.

name: Inner Reserve (Minor)
description: As the lesser talent, except the bonus is +2.

name: Inner Reserve (Major)
description: As the lesser talent, except the bonus is +4.

name: Inner Reserve (Greater)
description: As the lesser talent, except the bonus is +4.

name: Internal Clock
description: You receive a special bonus of +15 to your Time Sense skill and Time Sense is classified as an occupational skill for you.

name: Judge of Angles
description: You can judge angles and changes in the slant of relatively uniform, solid surfaces. You can tell the angle of an incline almost immediately. You receive a special bonus of +25 bonus when attempting to perceive traps or secret doors that are set in walls, floors, or ceilings.

name: Judge of Weaponry
description: You have a special bonus or +40 to your Weapon Evaluation skill.

name: Lightning Strike
description: You receive a special bonus of +5 to your initiative rolls. You receive no penalty for snap actions, but only receive a +5 for deliberate actions.

name: Martial Arts Training (Minor)
description: You receive a special bonus of +10 to your Martial Arts group, Self Control category, and to Special Defenses.

name: Martial Arts Training (Major)
description: As the minor talent, except the bonus is +15.

name: Martial Arts Training (Greater)
description: As the minor talent, except the bonus is +20 and one Special Defense skill is classified as everyman.

name: Natural Archer
description: You receive a 25% increase to all bow ranges and you receive a special bonus of +5 to your Missile Weapon category.

name: Natural Facility With Armor
description: You receive a special bonus of +10 to your Armor group. One Armor skill is classified as everyman.

name: Natural Horseman
description: You receive a special bonus of +25 to all maneuvers involving horses.

name: Natural Weapons Master
description: All weapon skills are classified as everyman.

name: Outdoorsman
description: You receive a special bonus of +50 to all Foraging, fire starting, and shelter location maneuvers while you are outdoors. You also receive a special bonus of +20 to all Tracking, Hunting, Stalk, and Hide maneuvers while you are outdoors.

name: Portage Skills
description: All of your encumbrance penalties are halved.

name: Power (Lesser)
description: You have 3 extra ranks of spells. Only your own base spells and your own realm open & closed spells may be chosen.

name: Power (Minor)
description: As the lesser talent above, except you have 10 ranks of spells.

name: Power (Major)
description: As the lesser talent above, except you have 25 ranks of spells. No more than 10 of these may be from any one spell list.

name: Power (Greater)
description: As the Major talent above, except you have 50 ranks of spells.

name: precision
description: Due to the precision of your strikes, you may make an Ambush maneuver every time you attack with a melee weapon. The GM will assign modifications to this maneuver based upon the combat situation—e.g., subtracting 35 while adding your flank/rear OB bonuses, subtracting the amount your target parries against you, etc.

name: Racial Training (Familiar)
description: Your race is known for a group of skills. You may pick up to 6 skills that are related somehow (subject to GM approval). You will receive a special bonus of +10 for those skills due to your upbringing.

name: Racial Training (Expert)
description: Your race is renown for their expertise with a group of skills. You may pick up to 6 skills that are related somehow (subject to GM approval). You will receive a special bonus of +20 for those skills due to your upbringing.

name: Shield Attack
description: You receive a special bonus of +20 to Shield Bash skill.

name: Skilled (Lesser)
description: You may receive a special bonus of +5 to one skill category, or receive a special bonus of +10 to one specific skill. A skill category or skill may only be chosen if its bonus progression is combined or standard. You may only purchase this ability once for a given skill or skill category.

name: Skilled (Minor)
description: As the lesser talent, except the skill category bonus is +10 and the skill bonus is +20.

name: Skilled (Major)
description: As the lesser talent, except the skill category bonus is +15 and the skill bonus is +30.

name: Skilled (Greater)
description: As the lesser talent, except the skill category bonus is +20 and the skill bonus is +40.

name: Sleight-of-Hand
description: You receive a special bonus of +20 to your Subterfuge • Stealth skill Category.

name: Swift Dresser
description: All of the time it takes to either put on or take off your armor is reduced by 25%.

name: Trained Regular Footman
description: Blocking, Tackling, Wrestling, and Boxing are classified as everyman skills for you.

name: Underground Upraising
description: You receive a special bonus of +10 to the Subterfuge • Mechanics and Subterfuge • Stealth skill categories. Select one Subterfuge • Stealth or Subterfuge • Mechanics skill that may be classified as everyman.

name: Warrior Extraordinaire
description: All melee weapons are classified as everyman. One Combat Maneuvers skill is also classified as everyman. You also receive a special bonus of +10 to Special Attacks.

name: Weapon Control
description: All weapons in your primary weapon category (that category with the lowest development point cost) have their fumble range reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 1). All other weapon categories have their fumble range reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
